mainSkillsList: Junior QA Engineer (Quality and Automated Testing)

siiJob.description: Full-stack development (front-end and back-end) on an Angular & Node.js project. Daily collaboration with a team based in India (in English). Front-end and back-end code development and refactoring. Conducted a training session on Playwright (QA reference).
siiJob.tasksSummary: Full-stack front-end/back-end development in an Angular & Node.js project. Daily collaboration with a team based in India (in English). Front-end and back-end development and refactoring. Led a training session on Playwright (QA Lead)
tasks: Implemented E2E tests in a dedicated repository, automatically triggered on each merge to the develop branch to prevent regressions.
Developed features and wrote their specifications.
Refactored several features, including optimizing a page displaying thousands of Excel-derived rows with partial data fetching.
Developed a secure Node.js controller allowing user deletion only in local and development environments (protecting production).
Containerized 7 application repositories using Docker Compose, enabling all services to start locally with a single click (Docker-in-Docker).
Performed code reviews and shared best practices.
siiJob.clientAttentionTitle: What can make a client notice this profile
clientAttentionsList: Implemented a robust E2E testing strategy (CI/CD, POM, documentation).
Performance and clean code mindset (front/back optimization, refactoring).
Ability to work in an international environment (daily English).
technicalEnvironmentsList: Languages: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, YAML, Markdown, Bash
Frameworks / Libraries: Angular, Node.js, Express.js, Prisma, Bootstrap, RxJS, Playwright
Tools: GitHub, Docker, Slack, Mattermost, Teams
functionalEnvironmentsList: Development of web interfaces for managing and visualizing large datasets (Excel-like).
Strong software quality context (testing, automation, CI/CD).

page2.personalWorkDescription: Full-stack development (front and back) of various apps using React, Angular & Node.js. Front-end and back-end code development and refactoring. Implementation of automated testing.
personalWorkTasksList: Set up front-end projects with Angular and React.
Implemented an MVC architecture for Node.js applications.
Set up E2E and unit tests automatically triggered on each merge to the main branch.
Developed features and wrote their specifications.
Migrated a React application from JavaScript to TypeScript.
page2.clientAttentionTitle: What can make a client notice this profile
clientAttentionsList: Strong knowledge of Angular, React, and Node.js.
Understanding of robust E2E testing strategies (CI/CD, POM, documentation).
Performance and clean code mindset (front/back optimization).
technicalEnvironmentsList: Languages: HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, TypeScript, YAML, Markdown, Bash
Frameworks / Libraries: Angular, Node.js, Express.js, Prisma, Bootstrap, RxJS, Playwright, Karma, Jasmine, Styled-Components, Material UI, ESLint, Prettier, Mongoose, NPM
Tools: GitHub, Docker, Slack, Mattermost, Teams, Figma, VS Code, AWS
